name: Iceolation
description: Iceolation is a first person survival horror game made in Unreal Engine 5. You are looking for a lost miner in an icy subterranean world. With the use of your flame/ice gun you can burn through ice walls, create your own ice to climb up, freeze water and more. Avoid hazards, explore the mysterious cavern and escape alive. This game is currently still in development. Follow for updates and news.
